Package org.pepstock.charba.client

Class NativeJsChartHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pepstock.charba.client.NativeJsChartHelper
  • @JsType(isNative=true,
        name="CharbaJsChartHelper",
        namespace="<global>")
final class NativeJsChartHelper
extends Object
    This is a wrapper for Java native object which is wrapping a CHARBA java script object implementation with some utilities to invoke CHART.JS callbacks, provided out of the box, the default one.
    Author:
    Andrea "Stock" Stocchero

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor Description
      private NativeJsChartHelper()
      To avoid any instantiation

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      (package private) static ArrayObject generateDefaultLabels​(Chart chart, NativeObject options)
      Returns an unmodifiable list of legend labels for that chart with the callback provided by CHART.JS out of the box, invoking generateLabels function property.
      (package private) static NativeObject getSubtitle​(Chart chart)
      Returns the subtitle elements from the chart.
      (package private) static ArrayObject getTooltipActiveElements​(Chart chart)
      Returns the active tooltip elements for the chart.
      (package private) static String interpolateColors​(String from, String to, double factor)
      Returns an interpolated color value for a specific type from CHART.JS.
      (package private) static void invokeDefaultChartEvent​(NativeObject options, String key, Chart chart, NativeObject event, ArrayObject items)
      Invokes the chart event callbacks, provided out of the box by CHART.JS.
      (package private) static void invokeDefaultLegendEvent​(NativeObject options, String key, Chart chart, NativeObject event, NativeObject item)
      Invokes the legend event callbacks, provided out of the box by CHART.JS.
      (package private) static void setTooltipActiveElements​(Chart chart, ArrayObject elements, NativeObject point)
      Sets the active tooltip elements for the chart.

    • Method Detail

      • interpolateColors

        static String interpolateColors​(String from,
                                String to,
                                double factor)
        Returns an interpolated color value for a specific type from CHART.JS.
        Parameters:
        from - starting value
        to - ending value
        factor - interpolation factor
        Returns:
        interpolated value for specific type

      • generateDefaultLabels

        static ArrayObject generateDefaultLabels​(Chart chart,
                                         NativeObject options)
        Returns an unmodifiable list of legend labels for that chart with the callback provided by CHART.JS out of the box, invoking generateLabels function property.
        Parameters:
        chart - chart instance
        options - chart options, generated merging all defaults.
        Returns:
        an array of legend labels.

      • invokeDefaultLegendEvent

        static void invokeDefaultLegendEvent​(NativeObject options,
                                     String key,
                                     Chart chart,
                                     NativeObject event,
                                     NativeObject item)
        Invokes the legend event callbacks, provided out of the box by CHART.JS.
        Parameters:
        options - chart options, generated merging all defaults.
        key - the key of options which should have the event callback
        chart - chart instance, used as function context
        event - native object of event wrapper from user interface
        item - legend item native

      • invokeDefaultChartEvent

        static void invokeDefaultChartEvent​(NativeObject options,
                                    String key,
                                    Chart chart,
                                    NativeObject event,
                                    ArrayObject items)
        Invokes the chart event callbacks, provided out of the box by CHART.JS.
        Parameters:
        options - chart options, generated merging all defaults.
        key - the key of options which should have the event callback
        chart - chart instance, used as function context
        event - native object of event wrapper from user interface
        items - array of datasets native objects

      • setTooltipActiveElements

        static void setTooltipActiveElements​(Chart chart,
                                     ArrayObject elements,
                                     NativeObject point)
        Sets the active tooltip elements for the chart.
        Parameters:
        chart - chart instance, used to get the tooltip
        elements - array of active tooltip elements
        point - synthetic event position used in positioning

      • getTooltipActiveElements

        static ArrayObject getTooltipActiveElements​(Chart chart)
        Returns the active tooltip elements for the chart.
        Parameters:
        chart - chart instance, used to get the tooltip
        Returns:
        the array of active tooltip elements

      • getSubtitle

        static NativeObject getSubtitle​(Chart chart)
        Returns the subtitle elements from the chart.
        Parameters:
        chart - chart instance, used to get the subtitle
        Returns:
        the native object of subtitle
